entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Double serialization in net481 accuracy problems #110276
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsArraySegment<T>(List<T>) overload #110275
  • [mono] System.Memory.Tests failing on Apple mobile #110266
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Switch recognition should not be lexical #107076
    10.0.0
  • For polymorphic deserialization, the type discriminator property cannot be set to required. #110248
  • The JsonSerializer.Serialize result has duplicate fields. #110260
  • [mono][interpreter] Mono interpreter is crashing during System.Data.Odbc.Tests (linux-x64 Release Mono_Interpreter_LibrariesTests) #101370
    10.0.0
  • .NET 9 Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() In certain situations, the program may crash. Exit code is -1073740791 #110261
  • nethost SIGSEGV on Linux when used with jemalloc #109773

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Do greedy 4-opt for backward jumps in 3-opt layout #110277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RuntimeAsync] Make Async marker a bit in MethodImpl flags #110274
    area-Meta
  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110271
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110269
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #110268
    area-GC-mono
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename {CLR,DOTNET}_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE #110259
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Remove lexical dependencies in switch recognition #110253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Properly handle exceptions thrown by mono_marshal_get_native_wrapper #110232
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Update unhandled exception handler API to match approved shape. #110254
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use static project from assets or `dotnet new`, unification of browser tests #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow optimizing mask conversions on x64 as well #110195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Disable GFNI tests for NAOT #110250
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update .NET 8 build images to use Azure Linux #110199
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Symbol clashes are not very difficult to encounter #2817

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift bindings] Add Swift code generation doc #2816
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • Interpreter design docs #2774
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WebToolsE2E] When "azd up" deploys an Aspire application with SqlClient, a security warning appears for the package "System.Private.Uri". #45220

Closed

  • Error: dotnet restore Fails with NullReferenceException in .NET SDK 9.0.100 During Docker Build #44841

PullRequests

Created

  • Add .json to editorconfig #45227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: move DevVersions jobs to a separate stage #45226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add projects, .config, and .nuspec to .editorconfig #45225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Use pipelineArtifact upload method for final join outputs #45221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • fix hanging issue in dotnet test --coverage #45224
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Bump darc #45186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WASI] Remove apphost to align with other mobile targets #45219
    Area-Infrastructure, arch-wasm, untriaged, 10.0.1xx

Updated

  • [release/9.0.2xx] Split GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink test class into multiple so Helix can run them separately #45056
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Stack Trace Explorer #76165
  • Area - Code Cleanup #76158
  • CTRL + click (and F12) on a partial property should always jump to user-defined part #76156
  • Files *.g.cs are not generated in `obj` folder #76155
  • Make anonymous function static (IDE0320) analyzer is extremely slow on .Net 8.0.401 #76154
  • Area - Call Hierarchy #76146

Closed

  • Consider moving AddImport implementation to Workspace layer #59179
    Backlog
  • Explore having a regex codefix that offers to simplify regex when possible. #59165
    Backlog
  • RE0001 should be moved to Analyzers layer #59101
    Backlog
  • VB IDE0058 change to Call or make unused a keyword #59063
    Backlog
  • Create a test for AdditiveSpans changes #58984
    Backlog
  • Implement interface quick fix does not add class brackets for nested types #26323
    Backlog
  • AbstractSpellCheckCodeFixProvider depends on IDE completion options #58745
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense not suggesting namespaces after `using` for top-level statements #58470
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup removes usings from external C# files #75979
  • "Remove Unnecessary Usings" should not delete blank lines above the using declaration. #55439
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35528.57 #76153
  • Inline Temporary Variable generates invalid code #53002
    Backlog
  • Set severity from Error List completely deletes existing editorconfig #51867
    Backlog
  • There is a conflict between the options for Pitch Settings #50061
    Backlog
  • removing unused usings when compile errors present #48337
    Backlog
  • Remove JTF.Run for razor mapping #47909
    18.0
  • Find References should identify 'new()' generic constraint as a use of parameterless constructor #47633
    Backlog
  • Missing using when Move To "class.cs" Quick-Action #46757
    Backlog
  • 'Generate inequality operators' when type already implements IComparable<> #41790
    Backlog
  • Add a refactoring to convert conditional to if statement #29346
    Backlog
  • Saving Visual Basic naming conventions that contain module specifications to an editorconfig file crashes Visual Studio #39845
    Backlog
  • C#, Inconsistant Label Indentation when Formatting #39169
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup during formatting: Remove unnecessary usings - Give option not to remove system namspace #38383
    Backlog
  • VB line commit should add missing argument parentheses #36545
    Backlog
  • VB Editor changed VB keywords casing although they are used as literal strings in my code! #35028
    Backlog
  • Go to Member - see all members even if you type nothing #34877
    Backlog
  • Suggest format specifiers based on type #34189
    Backlog
  • Make it possible to decide style rules based on context #34129
    Backlog
  • Find All References does not support using statements #34107
    Backlog
  • Summary of Possible Change Signature Enhancements #33977
    Backlog
  • StaticKeywordRecommender doesn't give a stable answer between usings in script #32214
    18.0
  • Include performance warning in loop conversion #31780
    Backlog
  • Formatting option for space after // #30239
    Backlog
  • `fixed` keyword formatting doesn't respect `Insert space after keywords in control flow statements` #29341
    Backlog
  • Go To support for decompiled types/members #28275
    Backlog
  • Unit Tests: Caret position not properly restored after undo when the original caret position doesn't match the location of the text change #28033
    18.0
  • SyntaxEditor.SetModifiers may not properly format the result when multiple modifiers are added at once #27835
    Backlog
  • Formatting is applied too aggressively on 'override' completion #27207
    Backlog
  • "Use collection initializer" indents trailing trivia #26529
    Backlog
  • Improve completion support for obsolete members #26488
    Backlog
  • async Main with multiple entrypoints #26315
    Backlog
  • Add CamelHumps selection similar to that of resharper #24823
    Backlog
  • Inline Refactoring Rename Issue with Regions in Visual Basic #24087
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Convert lambda to local function #23310
    Backlog
  • Change Signature should not be offered inside a string-literal. #18023
    Backlog
  • Array constructor currently falls under the csharp_style_var_elsewhere category. #17109
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense based on characters to the left of the cursor #13594
    Backlog
  • CodeLens count is inconsistent across partial declarations and linked file #13530
    Backlog
  • [Code Style] Implement a way to change style settings #13439
    Backlog
  • IDE Features should work on preprocessor symbols (rename, FAR, GTD, completion, etc) #11499
    Backlog
  • Removing unused using formats/changes other parts of the document #10237
    Backlog
  • ImportAdder API can result in new document having ambiguity errors #8604
    Backlog
  • [VB] 'Simplify type name' on Global alias and base class name introduces a conflict #8292
    Backlog
  • Refactoring "Introduce local for all occurences of..." does more than it should be allowed to #7504
    Backlog
  • XAML references are partially highlighted when searching for references from a constructor #7294
    Backlog
  • Find refs within a metadata as source view doesn't search it #6716
    Backlog
  • Invalid pretty-lister behavior when #If directive is preceeded by a semicolon #5570
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense autoselection for enums when inside of an enum should not include type name #5418
    Backlog
  • Cannot set background of XML Doc Comment CREFs, param names or param refs #4948
    Backlog
  • Implement extension method rewrite for Expanding within conditional access expressions #3260
    Backlog
  • Formatting: space after "delegate" in anonymous methods doesn't respect the "Space between method call and opening parenthesis" option #3257
    Backlog
  • Brace Matching should format embedded statement owner when inserting braces #3025
    Backlog
  • Completion: Shift+Home, Delete shouldn't trigger completion #698
    Backlog
  • Simplifier.ReduceAsync fails detect type-inference change when removing necessary cast #476
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more tests for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/76083 #76164
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clamp selections within a string literal so they do not go outside of it #76163
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use implicit initializer if present to generate type properties #76162
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue trying to generate fields/properties from a top level program #76161
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support implicit/explicit var with inferred lambda types #76160
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delete dupe loc strings #76159
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Property update return type when updating method. #76157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Insert parens when hitting semicolon after 'new' #76152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support static members in extract interface #76151
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with explicit interface completion and static interface members #76150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move off of specialized task methods #76149
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • REmove methods no longer in use #76148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'introduce using' to support expression statements #76147
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Infer better variable name when initializing from an anonymous type #76145
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do a better job matching properties to implement against existing properties #76144
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable skipped test #76143
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Format labeled statements when colon is typed #76142
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make in memory assemblies in InteractiveAssemblyLoader can be collected when use scripting #74915
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Add a dedicated fixer to fixup code in expression trees that is now calling restricted apis #76124
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update the patterns that 'use range operator' supports. #76129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration has vulnerable dependencies, no upgrade available #59223
  • Minor issues with RequestLocalizationMiddleware #59218
  • After running the project with https and logging in to the account, stop and run the project again with http, unable to log into account in Safari browser on Mac OS. #59216

Closed

  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59225
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59224
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions 9.0 needs additional TFM net8.0 #59095
  • Perf regression: updates #59215
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59222
  • Como Hackear o Facebook de Alguém Com Segurança #59221
  • .NET 9 Upgrade then Migration Problem ! #59217
  • [Blazor] <details> @ontoggle should support 2-way binding #59200
  • nuget package 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client' is not compatible with Blazor server webassembly using .NET 8.0 #59085
  • Blazor Web App Template Global Interactivity location causes Not Found issue when navigate to the page/component in Server project. #58944
  • SignalR hub Disconnects after 45minutes of connected to Server #59086

PullRequests

Merged

  • fix: target current LTS framework for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.Abstractions` #59219
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BindingFailure issue although DataType is set correctly #26288
  • AppShell Navigating (Event) ShellNavigationSource.Unknown when using back-arrow from detail page #26261
  • Alternative text Provided for the "Chart" is not descriptive enough: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Chart_Non text content. #26260
  • Wrong warnings from Resizetizer More than one 'MauiSplashScreen' is defined #26237
    Backlog
  • Only color is used to show the data in the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Use of Color. #26236
  • Chart information is not accessible using keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Keyboard. #26234
  • Section 508 502.3.1: (CommunityTemplate/button '') The Name property of a focusable element must not be null: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_AI4W. #26233
  • Visual label is not provided for the Chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instrunctions. #26232
  • Skiasharp version issue in maui 9 #26231
  • [MAUI] I10_Swipe The button can be infinitely extended, and the SwipeView automatically collapses #26221
  • Keyboard Focus is getting trapped at the "Dark/light" theme buttons:A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Hameburger_Keyboard #26218
  • iOS - OnNavigatedFrom is not fired when navigating back by swiping #26216
  • Not able to access the "Delete" button using the mouse or the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Task_Functionality. #26215
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Tabbed Page Bug in Windows #26214

Closed

  • [IOS] Cannot build release version : the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #26276
  • App fails to inject INavigationRootManager when using PushModalAsync #25961

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 25 #26255
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Added DidPopItem to the navigation renderer #26235
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] [Mac] Fix for Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26222
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    community ✨
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 20 #26142
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 24 #26220
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • Provided description for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button #26192
    area-templates, community ✨, t/a11y
  • [iOS] Fix ShellContent Title Does Not Update at Runtime #26062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed CollectionViewHandler2 null reference exception if ItemsLayout is set for Tablet but not on mobile devices #26152
    community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
    area-single-project
  • Revert "Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading" #26212
    i/regression, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Editor vertical text alignment not working after toggling IsVisible #26194
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix Tweener leak on Animation #26143
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to have different delete behaviors on child and parent classes for a shared FK? #35242
  • Allow Json property to be updated by using ExecuteUpdate or as a single property #35240
  • EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35239
  • Mapping entities with a foreign key value of 0 fails in EF 8.0.11 on Azure SQL #35238
  • Support span based collations comparison functions in Sqlite #35236

Closed

  • dotnet-ef - Could not load file or assembly 'ef, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' #35084
  • Issue with Column Naming in Migrations for Snake Case #34874
  • How can I update a Many to Many with Payload joining table #35064
  • Facing this issue on EF core 8.0 #35070
  • Discriminator with default name but different type not generated correctly in migration snapshots #35075
  • Index was out of range issue while migration #35116
  • collection-based materialization interceptor #35109
  • get names by referance instead of hardcoding #35160
  • The specified deps.json [...] does not exist. Missing net8.0 in path #35234
  • Migration keeps trying to add/delete a discriminator even though i specified e.HasBaseType((Type)null) #33188

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35241
  • Fix query filters with context accessors #35237

Merged

  • Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35124

Updated

  • Temporary fix for DropTable/CreateTable issue around temporal tables #35225
